name: BartenderSim.EXE
description:
- COMMENCE THE SIMULATION -

Mix your best drinks and help your clients overcome the obstacles of their life.

// A GAME INSPIRED BY VA-11 HALL-A

In BartenderSim.EXE you can mix a variety of drinks of all flavours.

Will you be able to satisfy your client's requests?

All the recipes for your drinks can be found on your phone. 

You can search for the strangest recipes.

Help them resolve their internal conflicts.

Pick your answers carefully.

Will you be able to leave an impact on the lives of your clients?

Follow me on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/angyy.dev/
